log.afterEmailLogin.undefined: INFO: afterEmailLoginApi is undefined. You could define a API in order to execute an after process for the login with e-mail. The API will receive a POST request with a  data = { authId }, and shall return a JSON with the user info: { userId, name, displayName, phone, email }
log.afterPhoneLogin.undefined: INFO: afterPhoneLoginApi is undefined. You could define a API in order to execute an after process for the login with phone. The API will receive a POST request with a  data = { authId }, and shall return a JSON with the user info: { userId, name, displayName, phone, email }
